name: potion
description: restores 200 hp of one character.

name: hi-potion
description: restores 1000 hp of one character.

name: x-potion
description: fully restores hp of one character.

name: mega-potion
description: restores 2000 hp to each party member.

name: ether
description: restores 100 mp of one character.

name: turbo ether
description: restores 500 mp of one character.

name: phoenix down
description: revives one character from ko.

name: mega phoenix
description: revives party from ko.

name: elixir
description: fully restores one character's hp & mp.

name: megalixir
description: fully restores hp & mp of party.

name: antidote
description: cures poison.

name: soft
description: cures petrification.

name: eye drops
description: cures darkness.

name: echo screen
description: cures silence.

name: holy water
description: cures zombie and curse.

name: remedy
description: cures all status abnormalities except ko and curse.

name: power distiller
description: makes one enemy drop power spheres.

name: mana distiller
description: makes one enemy drop mana spheres.

name: speed distiller
description: makes one enemy drop speed spheres.

name: ability distiller
description: makes one enemy drop ability spheres.

name: al bhed potion
description: cures poison, silence, petrification. restores 1000 hp of each party member.

name: healing water
description: fully restores hp of party.

name: tetra elemental
description: fully restores hp and casts nulall on a character.

name: antarctic wind
description: deals ice damage to an enemy.

name: arctic wind
description: deals ice damage to an enemy.

name: ice gem
description: deals ice damage to all enemies.

name: bomb fragment
description: deals fire damage to an enemy.

name: bomb core
description: deals fire damage to an enemy.

name: fire gem
description: deals fire damage to all enemies.

name: electro marble
description: deals lightning damage to an enemy.

name: lightning marble
description: deals lightning damage to an enemy.

name: lightning gem
description: deals lightning damage to all enemies.

name: fish scale
description: deals water damage to an enemy.

name: dragon scale
description: deals water damage to an enemy.

name: water gem
description: deals water damage to all enemies.

name: grenade
description: damages all enemies.

name: frag grenade
description: inflicts damage and armor break on all enemies.

name: sleeping powder
description: inflicts damage and sleep on all enemies.

name: dream powder
description: inflicts damage and sleep on all enemies.

name: silence grenade
description: inflicts damage and silence on all enemies.

name: smoke bomb
description: inflicts damage and darkness on all enemies.

name: shadow gem
description: reduces hp of all enemies by half.

name: shining gem
description: damages an enemy.

name: blessed gem
description: damages an enemy.

name: supreme gem
description: damages all enemies.

name: poison fang
description: inflicts damage and poison on an enemy.

name: silver hourglass
description: delays next turn of all enemies. inflicts slow on all enemies.

name: gold hourglass
description: damages all enemies and delays their next turn. deals damage and inflicts slow and delay on all enemies.

name: candle of life
description: casts doom on an enemy.

name: petrify grenade
description: petrifies all enemies.

name: farplane shadow
description: inflicts death on an enemy.

name: farplane wind
description: inflicts death on all enemies.

name: dark matter
description: deals major damage to all enemies.

name: chocobo feather
description: casts haste on one character.

name: chocobo wing
description: casts haste on party.

name: lunar curtain
description: casts shell on one character.

name: light curtain
description: casts protect on one character.

name: star curtain
description: casts reflect on one character.

name: healing spring
description: casts regen on one character.

name: mana spring
description: absorbs mp from an enemy.

name: stamina spring
description: absorbs hp from an enemy.

name: soul spring
description: absorbs hp & mp from an enemy.

name: purifying salt
description: damages an enemy and dispels its magic effects.

name: stamina tablet
description: doubles max hp of one character.

name: mana tablet
description: doubles max mp of one character.

name: stamina tonic
description: doubles max hp of party.

name: mana tonic
description: doubles max mp of party.

name: twin stars
description: reduces mp cost of one character to 0.

name: three stars
description: reduces party's mp cost to 0.

name: power sphere
description: activates strength, defense, or hp nodes on sphere grid.

name: mana sphere
description: activates magic, magic defense, or mp nodes on sphere grid.

name: speed sphere
description: activates agility, accuracy, or evasion nodes on sphere grid.

name: ability sphere
description: activates ability nodes on sphere grid.

name: fortune sphere
description: activates luck nodes on sphere grid.

name: attribute sphere
description: activates attribute nodes used by allies on sphere grid.

name: special sphere
description: activates special nodes used by allies on sphere grid.

name: skill sphere
description: activates skill nodes used by allies on sphere grid.

name: wht magic sphere
description: activates white magic nodes used by allies on sphere grid.

name: blk magic sphere
description: activates black magic nodes used by allies on sphere grid.

name: master sphere
description: activates any ability or attribute nodes on sphere grid.

name: lv. 1 key sphere
description: opens lv. 1 locks on sphere grid.

name: lv. 2 key sphere
description: opens lv. 2 locks on sphere grid.

name: lv. 3 key sphere
description: opens lv. 3 locks on sphere grid.

name: lv. 4 key sphere
description: opens lv. 4 locks on sphere grid.

name: hp sphere
description: changes empty node to hp node on sphere grid.

name: mp sphere
description: changes empty node to mp node on sphere grid.

name: strength sphere
description: changes empty node to strength node on sphere grid.

name: defense sphere
description: changes empty node to defense node on sphere grid.

name: magic sphere
description: changes empty node to magic node on sphere grid.

name: magic def sphere
description: changes empty node to magic def node on sphere grid.

name: agility sphere
description: changes empty node to agility node on sphere grid.

name: evasion sphere
description: changes empty node to evasion node on sphere grid.

name: accuracy sphere
description: changes empty node to accuracy node on sphere grid.

name: luck sphere
description: fills empty luck nodes on sphere grid.

name: clear sphere
description: clears nodes from sphere grid.

name: return sphere
description: return to any previously activated node on sphere grid.

name: friend sphere
description: move to an ally's location on sphere grid.

name: teleport sphere
description: move to any node activated by an ally on sphere grid.

name: warp sphere
description: move to any node on sphere grid.

name: map
description: displays world map.

name: rename card
description: renames aeon.
